text: kya eemaanadaaron ke lie abhee tak isaka vakt nahin aaya ki khuda kee yaad aur quraan ke lie jo (khuda kee taraph se) naazil hua hai unake dil naram hon aur vah un logon ke se na ho jaen jinako un se pahale kitaab (tauret, injeel) dee gayee thee to (jab) ek zamaana daraaz guzar gaya to unake dil sakht ho gae aur inamen se bahutere badakaar hain
